Ruleset List.Super Spreader: Swap drinks with the person on your left
Ruleset List.Exponential: Nominate one, two, then four drinks
Ruleset List.Anti-masker: You deny the existence of alcohol. Take a drink from each persons drink to get rid of the evidence
Ruleset List.Cross species transmission: Mix two drifferent drinks to make a new one
Ruleset List.Spillover: Mix two different drinks to make a new one
